body_html: @fcacarminati, Filters being a multiple of 16 is recommended to get the best performance on systems with Intel AVX512 instruction set. For systems with Intel AVX2 support (like your Macbook) multiple of 8 is enough. There's no restrictions related to the dataset size or the minibatch size, though the larger minibatch will results in better performance.

body: @fcacarminati, Filters being a multiple of 16 is recommended to get the best performance on systems with Intel AVX512 instruction set. For systems with Intel AVX2 support (like your Macbook) multiple of 8 is enough. There's no restrictions related to the dataset size or the minibatch size, though the larger minibatch will results in better performance.
